CMP0000.name: CMP0000
CMP0000.description: A minimum required CMake version must be specified.

CMP0001.name: CMP0001
CMP0001.description: CMAKE_BACKWARDS_COMPATIBILITY should no longer be used.

CMP0002.name: CMP0002
CMP0002.description: Logical target names must be globally unique.

CMP0003.name: CMP0003
CMP0003.description: Libraries linked via full path no longer produce linker search paths.

CMP0004.name: CMP0004
CMP0004.description: Libraries linked may not have leading or trailing whitespace.

CMP0005.name: CMP0005
CMP0005.description: Preprocessor definition values are now escaped automatically.

CMP0006.name: CMP0006
CMP0006.description: Installing MACOSX_BUNDLE targets requires a BUNDLE DESTINATION.

CMP0007.name: CMP0007
CMP0007.description: list command no longer ignores empty elements.

CMP0008.name: CMP0008
CMP0008.description: Libraries linked by full-path must have a valid library file name.

CMP0009.name: CMP0009
CMP0009.description: FILE GLOB_RECURSE calls should not follow symlinks by default.

CMP0010.name: CMP0010
CMP0010.description: Bad variable reference syntax is an error.

CMP0011.name: CMP0011
CMP0011.description: Included scripts do automatic cmake_policy() PUSH and POP.

CMP0012.name: CMP0012
CMP0012.description: if() recognizes numbers and boolean constants.

CMP0013.name: CMP0013
CMP0013.description: Duplicate binary directories are not allowed.

CMP0015.name: CMP0015
CMP0015.description: link_directories() treats paths relative to the source dir.

CMP0016.name: CMP0016
CMP0016.description: target_link_libraries() reports error if its only argument is not a target.

CMP0017.name: CMP0017
CMP0017.description: Prefer files from the CMake module directory when including from there.

CMP0019.name: CMP0019
CMP0019.description: Do not re-expand variables in include and link information.

CMP0020.name: CMP0020
CMP0020.description: Automatically link Qt executables to qtmain target on Windows.

CMP0021.name: CMP0021
CMP0021.description: Fatal error on relative paths in INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES target property.

CMP0023.name: CMP0023
CMP0023.description: Plain and keyword target_link_libraries() signatures cannot be mixed.

CMP0025.name: CMP0025
CMP0025.description: Compiler id for Apple Clang is now AppleClang.

CMP0026.name: CMP0026
CMP0026.description: Disallow use of the LOCATION property for build targets.

CMP0027.name: CMP0027
CMP0027.description: Conditionally linked imported targets with missing include directories.

CMP0028.name: CMP0028
CMP0028.description: Double colon in target name means ALIAS or IMPORTED target.

CMP0029.name: CMP0029
CMP0029.description: The subdir_depends() command should not be called.

CMP0030.name: CMP0030
CMP0030.description: The use_mangled_mesa() command should not be called.

CMP0031.name: CMP0031
CMP0031.description: The load_command() command should not be called.

CMP0032.name: CMP0032
CMP0032.description: The output_required_files() command should not be called.

CMP0033.name: CMP0033
CMP0033.description: The export_library_dependencies() command should not be called.

CMP0034.name: CMP0034
CMP0034.description: The utility_source() command should not be called.

CMP0035.name: CMP0035
CMP0035.description: The variable_requires() command should not be called.

CMP0036.name: CMP0036
CMP0036.description: The build_name() command should not be called.

CMP0037.name: CMP0037
CMP0037.description: Target names should not be reserved and should match a validity pattern.

CMP0038.name: CMP0038
CMP0038.description: Targets may not link directly to themselves.

CMP0039.name: CMP0039
CMP0039.description: Utility targets may not have link dependencies.

CMP0040.name: CMP0040
CMP0040.description: The target in the TARGET signature of add_custom_command() must exist and must be defined in the current directory.

CMP0041.name: CMP0041
CMP0041.description: Error on relative include with generator expression.

CMP0045.name: CMP0045
CMP0045.description: Error on non-existent target in get_target_property.

CMP0046.name: CMP0046
CMP0046.description: Error on non-existent dependency in add_dependencies.

CMP0047.name: CMP0047
CMP0047.description: Use QCC compiler id for the qcc drivers on QNX.

CMP0048.name: CMP0048
CMP0048.description: The project() command manages VERSION variables.

CMP0049.name: CMP0049
CMP0049.description: Do not expand variables in target source entries.

CMP0051.name: CMP0051
CMP0051.description: List TARGET_OBJECTS in SOURCES target property.

CMP0052.name: CMP0052
CMP0052.description: Reject source and build dirs in installed INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES.

CMP0053.name: CMP0053
CMP0053.description: Simplify variable reference and escape sequence evaluation.

CMP0054.name: CMP0054
CMP0054.description: Only interpret if() arguments as variables or keywords when unquoted.

CMP0055.name: CMP0055
CMP0055.description: Strict checking for the break() command.

CMP0056.name: CMP0056
CMP0056.description: Honor link flags in try_compile() source-file signature.

CMP0058.name: CMP0058
CMP0058.description: Ninja requires custom command byproducts to be explicit.

CMP0059.name: CMP0059
CMP0059.description: Do not treat DEFINITIONS as a built-in directory property.

CMP0060.name: CMP0060
CMP0060.description: Link libraries by full path even in implicit directories.

CMP0061.name: CMP0061
CMP0061.description: CTest does not by default tell make to ignore errors (-i).

CMP0063.name: CMP0063
CMP0063.description: Honor visibility properties for all target types.

CMP0064.name: CMP0064
CMP0064.description: Recognize TEST as a operator for the if() command.

CMP0065.name: CMP0065
CMP0065.description: Do not add flags to export symbols from executables without the ENABLE_EXPORTS target property.

CMP0066.name: CMP0066
CMP0066.description: Honor per-config flags in try_compile() source-file signature.

CMP0067.name: CMP0067
CMP0067.description: Honor language standard in try_compile() source-file signature.

CMP0068.name: CMP0068
CMP0068.description: RPATH settings on macOS do not affect install_name.

CMP0070.name: CMP0070
CMP0070.description: Define file(GENERATE) behavior for relative paths.

CMP0071.name: CMP0071
CMP0071.description: Let AUTOMOC and AUTOUIC process GENERATED files.

CMP0072.name: CMP0072
CMP0072.description: FindOpenGL prefers GLVND by default when available.

CMP0073.name: CMP0073
CMP0073.description: Do not produce legacy _LIB_DEPENDS cache entries.

CMP0075.name: CMP0075
CMP0075.description: Include file check macros honor CMAKE_REQUIRED_LIBRARIES.

CMP0076.name: CMP0076
CMP0076.description: The target_sources() command converts relative paths to absolute.

CMP0079.name: CMP0079
CMP0079.description: target_link_libraries() allows use with targets in other directories.

CMP0080.name: CMP0080
CMP0080.description: BundleUtilities cannot be included at configure time.

CMP0081.name: CMP0081
CMP0081.description: Relative paths not allowed in LINK_DIRECTORIES target property.

CMP0082.name: CMP0082
CMP0082.description: Install rules from add_subdirectory() calls are interleaved with those in caller.

CMP0083.name: CMP0083
CMP0083.description: To control generation of Position Independent Executable (PIE) or not, some flags are required at link time.

CMP0084.name: CMP0084
CMP0084.description: The FindQt module does not exist for find_package().

CMP0087.name: CMP0087
CMP0087.description: install(CODE) and install(SCRIPT) support generator expressions.

CMP0088.name: CMP0088
CMP0088.description: FindBISON runs bison in CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR when executing.

CMP0089.name: CMP0089
CMP0089.description: Compiler id for IBM Clang-based XL compilers is now XLClang.

CMP0090.name: CMP0090
CMP0090.description: export(PACKAGE) does not populate package registry by default.

CMP0091.name: CMP0091
CMP0091.description: MSVC runtime library flags are selected by an abstraction.

CMP0092.name: CMP0092
CMP0092.description: MSVC warning flags are not in CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS by default.

CMP0093.name: CMP0093
CMP0093.description: FindBoost reports Boost_VERSION in x.y.z format.

CMP0094.name: CMP0094
CMP0094.description: Modules FindPython3, FindPython2 and FindPython use LOCATION for lookup strategy.

CMP0095.name: CMP0095
CMP0095.description: RPATH entries are properly escaped in the intermediary CMake install script.

CMP0096.name: CMP0096
CMP0096.description: The project() command preserves leading zeros in version components.

CMP0097.name: CMP0097
CMP0097.description: ExternalProject_Add() with GIT_SUBMODULES "" initializes no submodules.

CMP0098.name: CMP0098
CMP0098.description: FindFLEX runs flex in directory CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR when executing.

CMP0099.name: CMP0099
CMP0099.description: Link properties are transitive over private dependencies of static libraries.

CMP0100.name: CMP0100
CMP0100.description: Let AUTOMOC and AUTOUIC process header files that end with a .hh extension.

CMP0101.name: CMP0101
CMP0101.description: target_compile_options() now always honors the BEFORE keyword.

CMP0102.name: CMP0102
CMP0102.description: The mark_as_advanced() command no longer creates a cache entry if one does not already exist.

CMP0103.name: CMP0103
CMP0103.description: Multiple calls to export() command with same FILE without APPEND is no longer allowed.

CMP0104.name: CMP0104
CMP0104.description: Initialize CMAKE_CUDA_ARCHITECTURES when CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER_ID is NVIDIA. Raise an error if CUDA_ARCHITECTURES is empty.

CMP0105.name: CMP0105
CMP0105.description: LINK_OPTIONS and INTERFACE_LINK_OPTIONS target properties are now used for the device link step.

CMP0107.name: CMP0107
CMP0107.description: It is not allowed to create an ALIAS target with the same name as an another target.

CMP0108.name: CMP0108
CMP0108.description: A target is not allowed to link to itself even through an ALIAS target.

CMP0109.name: CMP0109
CMP0109.description: find_program() requires permission to execute but not to read.

CMP0110.name: CMP0110
CMP0110.description: add_test() supports arbitrary characters in test names.

CMP0111.name: CMP0111
CMP0111.description: An imported target missing its location property fails during generation.

CMP0112.name: CMP0112
CMP0112.description: Target file component generator expressions do not add target dependencies.

CMP0113.name: CMP0113
CMP0113.description: Makefile Generators do not repeat custom commands from target dependencies.

CMP0114.name: CMP0114
CMP0114.description: ExternalProject step targets fully adopt their steps.

CMP0115.name: CMP0115
CMP0115.description: Source file extensions must be explicit.

CMP0116.name: CMP0116
CMP0116.description: Ninja generators transform DEPFILE s from add_custom_command().

CMP0117.name: CMP0117
CMP0117.description: MSVC RTTI flag /GR is not added to CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS by default.

CMP0118.name: CMP0118
CMP0118.description: GENERATED sources may be used across directories without manual marking.

CMP0119.name: CMP0119
CMP0119.description: LANGUAGE source file property explicitly compiles as specified language.

CMP0121.name: CMP0121
CMP0121.description: The list() command now detects invalid indices.

CMP0122.name: CMP0122
CMP0122.description: UseSWIG use library name conventions for CSharp language.

CMP0123.name: CMP0123
CMP0123.description: ARMClang cpu/arch compile and link flags must be set explicitly.

CMP0124.name: CMP0124
CMP0124.description: foreach() loop variables are only available in the loop scope.

CMP0125.name: CMP0125
CMP0125.description: The find_file(), find_path(), find_library() and find_program() commands cache their result in the variable specified by their first argument.  Prior to CMake 3.21, if a cache variable of that name already existed before the call but the cache variable had no type, any non-cache variable of the same name would be discarded and the cache variable was always used (see also CMP0126 for a different but similar behavior).  This contradicts the convention that a non-cache variable should take precedence over a cache variable of the same name.  Such a situation can arise if a user sets a cache variable on the command line without specifying a type, such as cmake -DMYVAR=blah ... instead of cmake -DMYVAR:FILEPATH=blah.

CMP0126.name: CMP0126
CMP0126.description: When this policy is set to NEW, the set(CACHE) command does not remove any normal variable of the same name from the current scope. The OLD behavior removes any normal variable of the same name from the current scope in the following situations:

CMP0128.name: CMP0128
CMP0128.description: When this policy is set to NEW:

CMP0129.name: CMP0129
CMP0129.description: Compiler id for MCST LCC compilers is now LCC, not GNU.

CMP0132.name: CMP0132
CMP0132.description: Do not set compiler environment variables on first run.

CMP0133.name: CMP0133
CMP0133.description: The CPack module disables SLA by default in the CPack DragNDrop Generator.

CMP0134.name: CMP0134
CMP0134.description: The default registry view is TARGET for the find_file(), find_path(), find_library(), and find_package() commands and BOTH for the find_program() command.

CMP0135.name: CMP0135
CMP0135.description: When using the URL download method with the ExternalProject_Add() or FetchContent_Declare() commands, CMake 3.23 and below sets the timestamps of the extracted contents to the same as the timestamps in the archive. When the URL changes, the new archive is downloaded and extracted, but the timestamps of the extracted contents might not be newer than the previous contents. Anything that depends on the extracted contents might not be rebuilt, even though the contents may change.

CMP0136.name: CMP0136
CMP0136.description: Watcom runtime library flags are selected by an abstraction.

CMP0137.name: CMP0137
CMP0137.description: try_compile() passes platform variables in project mode.

CMP0138.name: CMP0138
CMP0138.description: CheckIPOSupported uses flags from calling project.

CMP0139.name: CMP0139
CMP0139.description: The if() command supports path comparisons using PATH_EQUAL operator.

CMP0140.name: CMP0140
CMP0140.description: The return() command checks its parameters.

CMP0141.name: CMP0141
CMP0141.description: MSVC debug information format flags are selected by an abstraction.

CMP0142.name: CMP0142
CMP0142.description: The Xcode generator does not append per-config suffixes to library search paths.

CMP0143.name: CMP0143
CMP0143.description: USE_FOLDERS global property is treated as ON by default.

CMP0145.name: CMP0145
CMP0145.description: The Dart and FindDart modules are removed.

CMP0147.name: CMP0147
CMP0147.description: Visual Studio Generators build custom commands in parallel.

CMP0148.name: CMP0148
CMP0148.description: The FindPythonInterp and FindPythonLibs modules are removed.

CMP0149.name: CMP0149
CMP0149.description: Visual Studio Generators select latest Windows SDK by default.

CMP0150.name: CMP0150
CMP0150.description: ExternalProject_Add() and FetchContent_Declare() commands treat relative GIT_REPOSITORY paths as being relative to the parent project's remote.

CMP0151.name: CMP0151
CMP0151.description: AUTOMOC include directory is a system include directory by default.

CMP0152.name: CMP0152
CMP0152.description: file(REAL_PATH) resolves symlinks before collapsing ../ components.

CMP0153.name: CMP0153
CMP0153.description: The exec_program() command should not be called.

CMP0154.name: CMP0154
CMP0154.description: Generated files are private by default in targets using file sets.

CMP0155.name: CMP0155
CMP0155.description: C++ sources in targets with at least C++20 are scanned for imports when supported.

CMP0156.name: CMP0156
CMP0156.description: De-duplicate libraries on link lines based on linker capabilities.

CMP0157.name: CMP0157
CMP0157.description: Swift compilation mode is selected by an abstraction.

CMP0158.name: CMP0158
CMP0158.description: add_test() honors CMAKE_CROSSCOMPILING_EMULATOR only when cross-compiling.

CMP0160.name: CMP0160
CMP0160.description: More read-only target properties now error when trying to set them.

CMP0161.name: CMP0161
CMP0161.description: The CPACK_PRODUCTBUILD_DOMAINS variable defaults to true.

CMP0162.name: CMP0162
CMP0162.description: Visual Studio Generators add UseDebugLibraries indicators by default.

CMP0163.name: CMP0163
CMP0163.description: The GENERATED source file property is now visible in all directories.

CMP0164.name: CMP0164
CMP0164.description: add_library() rejects SHARED libraries when not supported by the platform.

CMP0165.name: CMP0165
CMP0165.description: enable_language() must not be called before project().

CMP0166.name: CMP0166
CMP0166.description: TARGET_PROPERTY evaluates link properties transitively over private dependencies of static libraries.

CMP0168.name: CMP0168
CMP0168.description: The FetchContent module implements steps directly instead of through a sub-build.

CMP0169.name: CMP0169
CMP0169.description: Calling FetchContent_Populate() with a single argument (the name of a declared dependency) is deprecated.

CMP0170.name: CMP0170
CMP0170.description: When FETCHCONTENT_FULLY_DISCONNECTED is set to true, FetchContent_MakeAvailable() and FetchContent_Populate() enforce the constraint that their source directory must already be populated. The requirement has always been documented, but it was not checked or enforced with CMake 3.29 or older.  This sometimes led to hard-to-trace errors when a project expected a dependency to have been populated, but its population was silently skipped.

CMP0171.name: CMP0171
CMP0171.description: codegen is a reserved target name.

CMP0172.name: CMP0172
CMP0172.description: The CPack module enables per-machine installation by default in the CPack WIX Generator.

CMP0174.name: CMP0174
CMP0174.description: cmake_parse_arguments(PARSE_ARGV) defines a variable for an empty string after a single-value keyword.

CMP0176.name: CMP0176
CMP0176.description: execute_process() ENCODING is UTF-8 by default.

CMP0178.name: CMP0178
CMP0178.description: Test command lines preserve empty arguments.

CMP0179.name: CMP0179
CMP0179.description: De-duplication of static libraries on link lines keeps first occurrence. This policy is only relevant when policy CMP0156 is set to NEW.

CMP0180.name: CMP0180
CMP0180.description: project() always sets <PROJECT-NAME>_* as normal variables.
